welcome_message_body: Welcome to Kinston, the charming and vibrant city known for its rich history and delicious southern cuisine. We hope you have a wonderful stay and take the time to explore and indulge in all that Kinston has to offer. Enjoy your stay!

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Pitt-Greenville Airport serves all commercial flights and houses various amenities for passengers.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Pitt-Greenville Airport caters to private and charter flights and offers services such as fueling and aircraft maintenance.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network for internet access.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Albert J Ellis Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
